name: THINK DIFFERENT
description:
Série 1 / Think Different / 2021 

1080x1080 . Gif 

Pense Diferente 

Think different

Think different before you even act , just do not think too much until you stop , and if you stop you think and if you think you stop .

The work can be understood in a few seconds through the typography and the visual form with its contrast in red, you can also see the growth of mental capacity through seconds before we act in different situations of our day.

In a world where almost everything is the same , we have an obligation to make ourselves different , we are neither better nor worse than anyone else , We are Different .

Explore your mind 

Tags Arte
